name: Trouble with Shield Guardians in SoU Ch 2
author: Valerfor

posts.author: Empyre65
posts.content:
I am having a problem that I have never had before with the shield guardians in SoU Chapter 2. I use the ring on them, but then I cannot harm them. I have tried a +1 dagger, +2 dagger, +3 sling, and a +3 heavy crossbow. Dorna (Rogue 1 / Cleric 9) can kill them with a spell (Flame Strike, I think), but any weapon I try in ineffective. posts.author: Empyre65
posts.content: I tried a +2 light hammer because it is finessable and does blunt damage, but it has no effect. I even tried re-loading the last save from the Interlude, figuring it might be a glitch, but it didn't help.

posts.author: Empyre65
posts.content: Since none of the weapons I could find in the game could touch those things, I resorted to getting one from Pretty Good Char Creator. I made a +3 dagger with 1 point of divine damage. That did the trick. I am now level 12, having done two of the towers, and I am standing at the door of the library.

posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content: Sounds like a glitch empyre, obviously, you have gone through SoU with other dextrous builds as well & you didn't have this problem, so I rule-out the dmg reduction possibility.
